info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Pondera and southeastern Glacier Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 519 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near South Browning to 6 miles east of Heart Butte. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Browning, South Browning, North Browning and Heart Butte. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 221 and 243. Highway 89 between mile markers 83 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
